sidePane.top: All Ive learned has been through onine courses at 2 amazing platforms: Platzi and PluralSight. (And, of course, reading docs, practicing, failling a lot and asking people online/offline)

sidePane.bottom: I like our world. Has much for us, and people are amazing. I think positively about our future. Lets keep it up.

experience.description: Successfully manage Certificates and keys (PKI) across your network.
Outsourcing company providing top trained engineers to visionary companies.

abilities.label: Micro-frontends architecture for scalable and flexible grow.

data.interests: Problems solver. Team player. Solutions oriented. I like to get to the guts of processes. Details matter! Maintainable code matters! No matter how good you think you are, is better doing as a team. Code to simplify, code for everyone. Enjoying the process :-)
